title: No-bake orange Aero速 cheesecake
ingredients: ['60g butter', '15 chocolate digestives', '700g Philadelphia速 light cream cheese', '250g double cream (light if possible)', '3 tablespoons icing sugar', 'few drops orange essence', '1 large bar orange Aero速 (or 5 to 6 normal size bars)', '4 sachets Options速 orange flavour drinking chocolate']
